semantic_identifier: [GOLD-174]: Debounce sales/opportunity signals to prevent one-off deal asks from boosting issue priority
title: Debounce sales/opportunity signals to prevent one-off deal asks from boosting issue priority

sections.text: Implement gating on Sales_Accelerator opportunity linkage so a single deal ask cannot materially increase an issue/theme’s priority score. Require a minimum evidence threshold (e.g., multiple distinct opportunities or corroborating support conversations) before applying any sales-driven uplift. Ensure the UI/issue object records when the uplift is suppressed and why, to maintain defensible prioritization.
